articles.title: X, Formerly Known As Twitter, Suffers Global Outage - CNET
articles.description: The outage affected users in countries including the US, Canada and India.
articles.content:
The social media platform, X, formerly known as Twitter, suffered an outage globally for about an hour on Thursday.
People using X, which is owned by Elon Musk, were not able to view their regular p… [+1116 chars]
